name: historic-hebrew-dates
description: Editing and parsing interface for historical Hebrew dates.
author: UU Digital Humanities Lab

scripts.test: yarn test-back && yarn test-front && yarn test-parse
scripts.start-back: cd api && python manage.py runserver --settings settings --pythonpath ..
scripts.livereload-back: cd api && python manage.py  livereload --settings settings --pythonpath ..
scripts.start: yarn start-front & yarn start-back & yarn watch-back
scripts.collectstatic-p: cd api && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput -v 0 --settings collect --pythonpath ..
scripts.static-p: yarn build-p && yarn clean-static && yarn collectstatic-p
scripts.start-back-p: cd api && python manage.py runserver --settings production --pythonpath ..
scripts.start-p: yarn static-p && yarn watch-front-p & yarn start-back-p
